review_data.title: Porridge O‘clock.

review_data.title: Good pasta and friendly staff!
review_data.content: Me and my girlfriend yesterday tried the pasta using poinz coupon. I am Italian and I have to say that the pasta was pretty good and the sauce was quite a lot. The staff was friendly and this is something we appreciated as well. We...More

review_data.title: Freude bei der arbeit

review_data.title: Good pasta dish
review_data.content: The Pasta Barn is located at the lower level of the Zurich main train station. Early morning this booth (Muesli Barn), serves early morning, healthy breakfast option like muesli and more. Starting at 11.30, the Pasta Barn takes over serving various pasta dishes and more....More
